data.name: Premium Reverse Mortgage
data.description: Our Heartland Premium Reverse Mortgage is designed specifically for customers with a property in Sydney or Melbourne valued at over $10 million. Aged care and secondary property options are available.

features.additionalInfo: View your reverse mortgage online or via mobile app.
Voluntary payments can be redrawn, subject to credit approval at time of request. Minimum redraw $2,500.
A facility you can apply for that provides regular monthly, quarterly, or yearly payments for up to ten years.
A facility you can apply for that allows you to request additional funds for future needs, subject to credit approval at time of draw-down.

eligibility.additionalValue: Reside and own property in Australia.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applicant can't currently be declared bankrupt.

eligibility.additionalValue: Applicant(s) can be employed or retired.

eligibility.additionalInfo: If joint, one applicant can be aged 55 or greater as long as the other applicant it 60+
Property must be located in Sydney or Melbourne valued at over $10 million.

fees.name: Registration and Discharge of Mortgage fee
Discharge administration fee (payable when discharging a mortgage held with us)
fees.additionalInfo: Covers administration and settlement costs. Payable at settlement.

fees.name: Equity protection option fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you request the Equity protection option to protect up to 50% equity in your property.

fees.name: Documentation re-issue fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if you request we re-issue loan documents.

fees.name: Settlement arrangement fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if attendance at settlement is required.

fees.name: Cash reserve drawdown or re-draw fee other than online
fees.additionalInfo: Charged each time you request a cash reserve drawdown or re-draw from your reverse mortgage.

fees.name: Further advance fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if you request a further advance on an existing reverse mortgage.

fees.name: Variation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you request we vary your reverse mortgage.

fees.name: Application fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee payable on settlement and deducted from the initial advance.

lendingRates.additionalValue: Interest is adjusted monthly 4.50% above the 90- day bank bill rate. Any change is based on the published 90-day bank bill on first business day of month, with the change occurring on the 15th calendar day of each month.
lendingRates.additionalInfo: LVR conditions apply. Principal and interest are payable at the end of the loan.
